open.title: Vumatel installation and maintenance problems | Khayelitsha & Delft
open.description: We would like to inform you about the challenges that we are currently experiencing with installation & maintenance activities in the Khayelitsha and Delft areas, Western Cape. Due to increased violence in this area, our contractor partners are not able to freely access the area to work. All maintenance and installation activities in this area will be on hold until further notice. The safety of our contractor partners remains our priority.

open.title: Vumatel Reach Maintenance | Khutsong
open.description: Vumatel Reach is conducting maintenance in Khutsong on the 2025/05/08, 21:00 to 2025/05/09, 07:00, users affected will experience limited to no connectivity during the maintenance window. We apologize for any inconvenience caused.

closed.title: Outage FrogFoot - Afrihost | Northern Region
closed.description: We are investigating an outage affecting all Frogfoot clients in the Northern Region. Affected clients will experience no connectivity. We apologise for the inconvenience caused.
closed.resolution: Technician onsite restore the backup power feed. Outage resolved

updates.content: Technician onsite restore the backup power feed. Outage resolved
Frogfoot technicians are en-route to the datacentre to investigate.
